sentences.sContent: ...It will slash staffing at its fleet of 770 stores...
...where residents in the countryside slash and bum forests each growing season to clear space for farming...

synos.tran: 猛砍；鞭打；严厉批评；大幅度裁减或削减
削减；斜线；猛砍；砍痕；沼泽低地

remMethod.val: sl ＋ ash(灰尘) → 举着斧子乱砍， 弄得到处是灰 → 砍

words.tran: 猛烈的；严厉的；冲劲十足的；巨大的
断木机；刀；乱砍者；血淋淋的恐怖片

trans.tranOther: to cut or try to cut something violently with a knife, sword etc

trans.tranCn: 砍， 砍痕； 斜线号
trans.tranOther: a line (/) used in writing to separate words, numbers, or letters
